title: Emotes not working - error EM03
body: Emotes weren't showing up in game, and would show an error message when I went into my emotes tab. Some other players have had problems too.

replies.body:
I have had the same, emotes pop-up is blank in-game. When I tried to edit in emote tab, error message like you.

It doesn't effect gameplay, so no big deal.
